channel.title: bias on A Potpourri of Data Science & Data Engineering Topics
channel.description: Recent content in bias on A Potpourri of Data Science & Data Engineering Topics

item.title: Biases in learning to rank models and three approaches to deal with them
item.description: Search engines rely on models, which rank the matching results for a given user query. These models optimize the order of items. They learn how to rank items in a result list, therefore the name Learning-to-Rank (LTR) models.
